item.title: Temporary lights still there, 20th January
item.description:
Please can someone tell my why we have had temporary traffic lights on the junction of Manor Road by Spirax Sarco for over a year when the permanent lights have been there all the time just not activated? When are the permanent lights going to be activated? How much has been wasted on paying for the temporary lights? We have not needed lights there for years so why the decision that we need them when a roundabout has in my opinion, been put in the wrong place when exiting from the new estate. Why wasn’t the roundabout put at the junction which would have made smooth traffic movement on the whole area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Hole/subsidence next to manhole, 20th January
item.description:
This is outside 38 Melville Road. Saw it when walking with my son. It is situated next to a circular man hole, so this could be subsidence into the drainage/sewerage cavity. It is at the end of number 38’s drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61,63, Melville Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
